title: Detox and Cleanse — Internal Wisdom
description: Experience the Ionic Foot Bath, Mud packing and Body Contour Wrap to detoxify and cleanse the body.
cleaned_text: INFRARED SAUNA 30 MIN: $40 | 45 MIN: $50 | 60 MIN: $55 AVAILABLE) great for two! Add $10 Up to 6x as effective as a traditional sauna, this relaxing detox in a private setting promotes muscle recovery and repair, circulation, and renewed skin appearance while lowering blood pressure and reducing stress. A blend of creams using fruit enzymes, niacin, aloe, and cinnamon extract, the M'lis Contouring System utilizes circulation and gentle pressure to flush toxins and remove inches. MUD PACKING 30 min: $85 | 60 min: $100 REPOLARIZE INTERFERENCE FIELDS. Mud packing session is a form of very specific detoxification. Personalized sessions to eliminate the reflex pattern of scars and traumas. Clearing scars and traumas with specialized techniques and high quality ingredients can lead to greater health and less supplements. Call to schedule your appointment time 916.817.4407 IONIC FOOT BATH Single: $55 (packages available) This technology uses alternating negative and positive ion technology to remove waste byproducts through the feet. This system has been reported to alleviate pain, stiffness, congestion, and headaches and improve sleep and mental clarity. Call to schedule your time, 916.817.4407 Far-Infrared Earthing MAT with So-Sound $45 | 60 min: $55 Ground yourself and Relax on our Earthing Mat. It is a unique multilayer health system combining the healing benefits of the natural elements of the Earth and Sun. Combining Far-Infrared Light and Red Light 660Nm wavelength which is proven to stimulate collagen synthesis and is great for a full-body skin rejuvenation. It is deep penetrating into the body Far Infrared Rays(FIR) are amplified and structured in the Mat through the release of Amethyst, Jade, and Tourmaline Crystals which act as superconductors.
